name: Gnose [Rio] (IAPSOP)
content:
Gnose [Rio] (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Gnose Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: Gnose. Revista de Sciencia Rosa Cruz e Occultismo / Revista Mensal Illustrada. 1935-1981? Monthly Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Language: Portuguese. Editor: Arnoldo Krumm-Heller; Domingos Margarinos, J. Soares Oliveira. Corporate author: Fraternitas Rosicruciana Antiqua 1/1, August 1935-1989(?) 32 pp. This was the organ in Brazil of Krumm-Heller's Fraternitas Rosicruciana Antiqua. Several issues reproduced in Peter-R. Konig, ed., Ecclesia Gnostica Catholica: Die Gnostischen Neo-Christen (Munich: ARW, 1998), and the issue for October 1936 in PDF format in http://www.upasika.com. Issues:Gnose V2 N3 Oct 1936
